wikipedia_page.main: Dame Helen Carruthers Mackenzie DBE (13 April 1859 – 25 September 1945) was a Scottish suffragist, pioneering social work educator and public health campaigner.

response: * Dame Helen Carruthers Mackenzie, health campaigner, was born here in 1859.Tom Begg, ‘Mackenzie , Dame Helen Carruthers (1859–1945)’, Oxford Dictionary of National Biography, Oxford University Press, 2004 accessed 28 Dec 2016
*Helen Carruthers Mackenzie (1859–1945), British educationist and public health campaigner
